name: Abundant Revelations

sections.body: Choose one of your revelations that has a number of uses per day. You gain 1 additional use per day of that revelation.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: You can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects do not stack. Each time you take the feat, it applies to a new revelation.
sections.name: Special

description: You can plumb the depths of your mystery to use your revelations more often.
